import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Content, HeadWrap, SubHeadWrap, TrainingPage, SubHeadWrapBatch } from "./Styles"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; function LongTraining(props) { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return ( <> Online Mediation Training Program - Dispute Resolution Program - JustAct Mediation Training Programme
{/* Welcome to The World of Mediation */} Weâ€™re so glad that you showed interest in training! This document is meant to provide with the course objectives and the learning objectives of this training program. Course Objectives

Mediation as a dispute resolution process involves handling inter- personal dynamics and negotiations. The objective of this course is to impart the necessary skills, techniques and process knowledge required by anyone to resolve a dispute of simple to moderate complexity, independently through mediation.

Learning Objectives
  1. What is mediation and where is it used ?
  2. Nature of disputes & personalities in a dispute
  3. What is the objective of mediation ?
  4. Characteristics of mediation
  5. Mediation and its interplay with the court system
  6. Principles of negotiation
  7. Structured Process of Mediation
  8. How to handle impasse and how to problem solve a tough mediation
  9. What NOT to do in a mediation and what is NOT mediation
  10. Communication skills required in conducting a mediation - Observing, Listening, Reframing, Managing Bias
  11. Writing a mediation settlement agreement and minuting meetings
  12. Ethics of a mediator and how to handle conflict of interest
 Duration
  • 15 Hours of Classroom Sessions over 3 weekends.
  • 15 hours of Self Learning Videos.
  • 10 hours of Role Plays & Exercises.
 Curriculum

Participants are expected to complete the self-learning modules and exercises prior to the ClassRoom sessions. Role plays & exercises during the ClassRoom sessions, may also be followed by similar exercises, role plays and discussions to be done among participants in groups, on their own, which will be assessed and evaluated. Video recording of role plays will need to be shared by participants.

Pricing

Training Cost: Rs. 40,000 + GST**
Limited Time offer **Individuals can pay Rs. 25,000 and pay the rest when they start mediating

Batches {/* Size of the batch*: */}

Size of the batch*:


  • Min participants- 15
  • Max participants- 21**

*size of the batch is in multiples of 3 for role-play exercises.
**The minimum number of registrations required to commence a batch is 15. Kindly note that the registration shall be done for a max of 21 participants on a first-come-first-serve basis.

Eligibility

Graduate with 10 years of professional experience.

 Contact
  • Madhav Pudipeddi
  • +91-99494 13249
  • madhav.pudipeddi@justact.co.in
Brochure Click here to Open ); } export default LongTraining;
